wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Jenkins is a Welsh powerlifter and martial artist. He is a former junior world powerlifting champion and holds Welsh, British, European and world records in the powerlifts. Jenkins has been described as one of the greatest junior powerlifters of all time. Chris Jenkins is also the former 90 kg (198 lb) and 82.5 kg (181 lb) class World Champion with the World Powerlifting Congress.
